src: [start] ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . LC : Mhm . RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] LC : Ok . LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok . RP : We have time . LC : We 'll walk slowly . RP : We 'll walk slowly . LC : Yes . RP : There 's no need to worry . RP : Ok , there you go , we 're in the ward . We need to ask where the reception for this ward is . [MASK] LC : Ok . RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . RP : Do you want to ask him ? LC : Ok . [end] LC : Um ... Where is the reception for the rheumatology ward ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( reception ) ) LC : Ah ... RP : Ok , thank you . @ CG ( LC+RP , go-to ( reception ) ) RP : So we 'll take a ticket . LC : Mhm ... RP : And then we 'll wait until we 're called . LC : Ok. Is there 's a waiting room ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) RP : Yes , there 's a waiting room just there . We can sit down . @ AG ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) LC : Ok. @ CG ( LC , go-to ( waiting_room ) ) RP : So you do n't get tired . LC : Ok . ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day .

LC : Ok .

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [start] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . LC : Where can I get information ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [end] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . @ G ( LC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ; G ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ; G ( LC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . @ AG ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LC : For the lift ? ARI : Yes . LC : Thank you very much . ARI : Thank you . ARI : See you around , have a nice day .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Where is room 17 ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? [MASK] RC : ARI , can you ... sorry ... He is n't responding . RC : ARI ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to come and inform you . RC : ARI , I do n't have a watch , is there a clock in the room so I can find out the time ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception .
tgt: RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LP : How long before my appointment ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) RC : ARI , can you ... sorry ... He is n't responding . RC : ARI ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to come and inform you . RC : ARI , I do n't have a watch , is there a clock in the room so I can find out the time ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( time ) )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
tgt: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) )

src: LC : I 'd prefer a hot chocolate . @ G ( LC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RP : And why not herbal tea ? @ G ( RP , drink ( herbal_tea ) ) [start] LC : Well , yes . [MASK] RP : To de-stress . [MASK] RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] RP : Well , great , thank you . [MASK] LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . [end] RP : Ah great , thank you . @ CG ( LC+RP , go_to ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Goodbye . ARI : You 're welcome . RP : We do n't need you anymore , goodbye . ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . RP : Great , well , we 're done .

We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? @ G ( LC+RP , drink ( hot_drink ) ) ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . @ AG ( LC+RP , drink ( hot_drink ) ) RP : Well , great , thank you . @ CG ( LC+RP , drink ( hot_drink ) ) LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? @ G ( LC+RP , go_to ( ground_floor ) ) ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left .
